name: Appliance Electrician
tag_list: dryer, electrician, appliance, repair, appliance-repair, refrigerator, company, new, best, quality, service, fast, today, value
overview:
Appliance Electrician(applianceelectrician.com) is known for their very reasonable rates and high quality service in the Los Angeles county area. Servicing all major residential and commercial appliances.

Appliance Electrician is also one of the fastest growing appliance repair service companies in California that specialize in appliance repair and maintenance services for all makes and models of refrigerators, dryers and more. Appliance Electrician has been the underdog in the appliance repair or dryer repair or refrigerator repair industry. Although they repair all kitchen and or laundry appliances, they have been constantly been muscled out by the bigger competitors on the block with their high rank advertisement and spam emails. Appliance Electrician simply refuses to lower themselves to that, but they still understand how business works. They take a more genuine approach with customers and chat on possible solutions before they try scheduling you right away.

They strive still and have survived thanks to loyal customers that can see past industry formalities and see where the quality lies. One of their company philosophies are, “The most amount of work for the least amount of pay. Why? Why not! If it is still reasonable and profitable why shouldn’t we have lower costs! Doesn’t everyone want that? “-Alex Knight (General Manager)Their main office is based in Glendale California, but they do serve almost all LA county. in fact, they usually have a technician that lives near you so that way they can always say they are local.
